TopicTitle: Saturn V Onboard Booster Camera Launch into orbit (HD!)

Articles.Content:
Kerbal Space Program: Saturn V Rocket - Onboard Booster Camera views (HD!)

Using Ramon\'s onboard booster cameras and the GoDammit Saturn V, I launched to get some cool views of the initial ride into orbit. Also in this video is a Monty Python song, which I claim NO OWNERSHIP OF and is being used under fair use and YouTube\'s terms of service.

This video spans from ignition sequence until the S-IVB has inserted the spacecraft into orbit. No Trans Lunar Injection is shown.
Ramon made them. Check the plug-in powered addons. I just typed his name into the search bar, located the post where he put them and downloaded.

Every time I tried using the Saturn V parts, My vehicle either got 20 meters off the ground, Then spun out of control and crashed, Or I got to 10,000 meters, And it spun out of control and crashed....

Love and Tolerence

Orange7093
